name: VFurrika!
description:
VFurrika! is an addictive puzzle game that combines the charm of your favourite VFur streamers with strategic gameplay.
Drop your favorite furry VTuber into a glass and witness them merging into other VTubers upon contact!

Gameplay
The game is simple: Aim and drop randomly-generated VTubers heads into a glass.

Have 2 of the same heads touch each other for them to merge into a bigger head of another type.
This kind of gameplay allows combos to be made, but only if you’ve got skills!

Once the glass is filled to the brim, the game is over, but you can upload your score to the Leaderboards. Try beating your friends’ scores!

Features:
  • Leaderboards
  • Addictive Gameplay
  • Recognizable Faces
  • Cute Visuals
